name: Poker Show VR
description:
Notice: Requires a Virtual Reality headset and a Gamepad!

Poker Show VR is an entertaining VR poker game featuring classic five card draw poker meets real-life fashion models as opponents, who tastefully remove clothing when they lose.
The game focuses on real-life experience, and features a dynamic mix of pre-shot panoramic videos of beautiful models and interactive content.

Poker Show VR is the first poker game which gives you the illusion of reality.

Key Features:

  • Classic five card draw poker game
  • 3 real-life fashion models as opponents
  • Achievement system – 18 achievements
  • Leaderboards
  • Social Experience – selfies and text messages from opponents after you beat them
